Articles.Content: Do any of the Asteroids mods still work? I've tried Custom Asteroids and Fallen Asteroid Project but they do nothing. I am running both V.24 and V.25 of KSP. Not sure if I have to activate the mod somehow?
I'm using Custom Asteroids on 0.25 and it's working - took awhile before anything turned up though - they don't seem to show up quite as often as stock asteroids.
